```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(datasauRus)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Resumen de los Datos
```{r resumen}
resumen <- datasaurus_dozen %>%
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  summarize(
    mean_x = mean(x),
    mean_y = mean(y),
    std_dev_x = sd(x),
    std_dev_y = sd(y),
    corr_x_y = cor(x, y)
  )

resumen
```

# Grafico de los datasets
```{r graficos, fig.width=10, fig.height=6}
ggplot(datasaurus_dozen, aes(x = x, y = y, colour = dataset)) +
  geom_point(size = 1.5) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol = 3)
```
